casebody.data:
BRIAN S.
v.
COMMISSIONER OF CORRECTION Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided May 30, 2017

Michael W. Brown, assigned counsel, in support of the petition.

Timothy F. Costello, assistant state's attorney, in opposition.

The petitioner Brian S.'s petition for certification for appeal from the Appellate Court, 172 Conn.App. 535, 160 A.3d 1110 (2017), is denied.
